message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to share with you a unique product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I can offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
